boons.name: Brutal Strength
boons.description: Gain +10 damage on your normal attacks.

boons.name: Bloodlust
boons.description: Gain +15 damage on your special attacks.

boons.name: Hunter's Eye
boons.description: Gain +5 attack priority on all weapons. If your weapon is a bow, gain +5 damage on your normal and special attacks.

boons.name: Precision Strike
boons.description: Gain a 10% chance to deal double damage on your normal and special attacks.

boons.name: Reciprocation
boons.description: When attacked, there is a 44% chance to redirect 50% of damage taken to the attacker.

boons.name: Charm
boons.description: After using your special attack, there is a 44% chance to stun the target for one turn.

boons.name: Smite
boons.description: If you were to take lethal damage, execute the enemy who delivered the attack. If the enemy is a boss (excluding minibosses), it deals 10% max hp damage instead.

boons.name: Thundering Fury
boons.description: Once you lose attack priority, halve the defense of the target you just attacked.

boons.name: Sucky Wucky
boons.description: 5% of all damage dealt is restored as health.

boons.name: Rejuvenation
boons.description: After clearing a room, restore +5 hp and gain +1 max hp.

boons.name: Divine Protection
boons.description: Your max hp is increased by 50% of your attack and defense.

boons.name: Berserker
boons.description: Reduce your max hp to 10, but you gain a 500% damage bonus.

boons.name: Sheath
boons.description: You gain +25 attack priority but deal 75% reduced damage.

boons.name: Playing with Fire
boons.description: Switches your special attack to a bomb that deals 25% of an enemy's max hp. If you do not use the bomb within 4 rooms, you blow up and die.

boons.name: Exposed
boons.description: Convert 100% of your defense into attack.
